meanings.definition: A printing technique using two colors.
meanings.sent1: The brochure was designed with duotones to save on printing costs.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured beautiful duotones of a sunset.
meanings.sent3: The duotones in the flyer made the pictures look like they were from a different era.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork used duotones to create a sense of harmony between the colors.
meanings.sent5: The duotones in the poster made the images stand out vividly.

meanings.definition: An image or photograph reproduced in two tones.
meanings.sent1: The art book showcased stunning duotones of famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: The photographer specialized in capturing landscapes in duotones.
meanings.sent3: The duotones in the gallery made the photos look like they were from a vintage collection.
meanings.sent4: His portfolio included duotones that added depth to the black and white images.
meanings.sent5: The duotones in the exhibition left a lasting impression on the viewers.
